creator: thebasserist@hotmail.com
text:
My server cannot be accessed from outside my local network which is set up by 
a router with the DMZ set to my server's ip address, which should allow it to 
be gotten to from the outside world. However, this is not so. I have a Linksys 
Broadband Wireless B Router, though I use an ethernet cable rather than a 
wireless network card to access it. I do not understand what is wrong. Any 
suggestions?

Thanks, 
Nick.

PS. Sorry if this is the wrong place to look for help, I'm out of places to 
turn.

Please do not use the bug database to ask support questions.
The appropriate place to ask is: http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
creator: mads@apache.org
